sentences.en: A measure called the coincident index provides information about current conditions.
sentences.cn: 一种称作同步指数的衡量方式用以提供当前形势变化的信息.

sentences.en: Any outgoing ray path must be coincident with that of the returning ray.
sentences.cn: 任何出发的射线与返回的射线路径完全相同.

sentences.en: But the results of studies based on BPF are not always coincident with clinical condition.
sentences.cn: 然而在BPF获得的结果往往与临床有很大的差异.

sentences.en: Check if approval is coincident with Authorization & Approvals procedure.
sentences.cn: 检查付款审批签字权限是否与授权批准等级流程一致.

sentences.en: Coincident interests with the corporate rich and political directorate are pointed out.
sentences.cn: 有人指出这合乎的是公司富豪和政治官员的利益。

sentences.en: Coincident with the talks, the bank was permitted to open a New York branch.
sentences.cn: 会谈的同时，该银行已获准在纽约开设分行。

sentences.en: Disease and coincident dissemination of virus may occur to produce an epidemic.
sentences.cn: 本病及同时传播着的病毒即可引起一次流行.

sentences.en: Its pathogenicity was markedly coincident with inoculated dosage.
sentences.cn: 其致病性与剂量有明显的相关性.

sentences.en: John: What a coincident! We were born at the same day.
sentences.cn: 约翰: 真巧! 我们竟在同一天出生.

sentences.en: My opinion was coincident with hers.
sentences.cn: 我的意见与她的完全一致.

sentences.en: The calculation results are coincident well with the test data.
sentences.cn: 计算结果与实测数据相吻合.

sentences.en: The results were coincident withthe. calculated data and the thermocouple measurements.
sentences.cn: 测得的刀具表面温度与理论结果及热电偶方法所得结果相符合.

sentences.en: Their aims are coincident with ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标与我们的一致。

sentences.en: These parallels cannot be merely coincident.
sentences.cn: 这些相似之处不可能只是巧合。

sentences.en: Your opinion is coincident with me.

words.tran_cn: 巧合的；符合的；暗合的；一致的

trans.tran_cn: <正>同时发生的，（时间上）巧合的，相符的，一致的
trans.tran_en: existing or happening at the same place or time
